title: Swipe Slate Pro 2 GB RAM 16 GB ROM 10 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Champagne Gold)

product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, AC Power Adapter, USB Cable, Earphone, OTG Cable, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Great Display: With its 25.6 cm (10.1) HD IPS screen, view videos and photos in great clarity.
product_description.Camera: Take clear photos/videos with its 5 MP rear camera. Use its 2 MP front camera to click amazing selfies.
product_description.Powerful Performance: Seamlessly multitask without any lag as it is powered by a 1.1 GHz quad-core processor. In addition to this, the 2 GB RAM and 16 GB ROM help load webpages quickly and install apps instantly.
product_description.Battery Life: This tab is powered by a 5000 mAh battery.
product_description.Dual SIM 4G VoLTE: Use two 4G SIMs on this phone and make online calls on either SIM using the VoLTE network.
product_description.Other Features: This tab runs on Android Marshmallow.

It's very sorry to say that Flipkart sells such brands & even do not offer proper customer service.
Despite of mixed reviews on the product I still decided to go for it as the specs mentioned were really good and the price was also a highlight. But the product was delivered I personally faced below problems...
1. Battery automatically discharges in 2-3 hrs without any usage.
2. When battery reaches 25% mark tablet switches off automatically.
3. Even though its a 4G tablet it hardly catches 4G network (tried with Idea and Vodafone 4G) hence speed is very slow.
4. Camera and flash quality is pathetic, though its given as 5MP but results are like VGA camera.
5. Flipkart seriously cheats here, I have marked the product return twice, Flipkart rejected. Then finally they agreed to send some technical person to inspect who never turned up. Thus 10 days replacement period is over and I am left with the same piece.
5. Surely recommend NOT TO BUY this product or similar one which gives rosy pictures but in actual we end in frustration.

7. Screen protection is not available any where.

Sir, Neither in your manual nor in any pictures or video you mentioned how to insert sim in the Swipe Slate Pro Tab and the sim slot is also very complex, once the sim inserted wrongly it will stuck in it. i bought new tab with great expectation but disappointed in the first impression. there are no guidance anywhere how to put sim in the complex slots and it got stuck, now i have to go to service centre to remove it. it is pathetic without even starting the phone i have to go service centre. please at least upload guidance or mention in your phone manual to how to put sim in the complex slot or make videos on it. there are no input anywhere for help.
